about_the_game:
Are you ready to drive, smash, and crash your way to the White House? In President Race, the race for the presidency has never been this wild! Choose your favorite presidential candidate and hit the road in a high-octane, laugh-out-loud racing extravaganza. Even Hillary Clinton is back for another shot at the top spot!

Gameplay
Pick your candidate and start your engines! The goal is simple: collect as much campaign money as possible while ruthlessly annihilating your competition. But watch out for the regular traffic – crashing into civilians won't win you any votes! Navigate through bustling streets, highways, and iconic landmarks as you race towards the ultimate prize: the White House.

Customization
With all that campaign cash, you can turn your presidential campaign bus into the ultimate ride. Customize your luxurious tour bus with:

- Shiny rims
- High-performance spoilers
- Reinforced armor
- And even neon underglow lighting!

Show the nation that you not only have the policies but the style to become President of the United States.

Features
- Iconic Candidates: Race as Trump, Biden, Hillary, and more!
- Chaotic Races: Annihilate your opponents while avoiding everyday traffic.
- Epic Customization: Pimp your ride with crazy modifications.
- Hilarious Gameplay: With witty commentary and over-the-top antics, every race is a riot.
- Will you out-race, out-smash, and out-style your opponents to become the next President of the United States? It's time to Vote to Crash! Your campaign bus is waiting – let's make history!

Enjoy the race to the White House, and may the best driver win!
